full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP): C.2 Information Technology Security Methodology, Policy and Procedures Analyst Security VA Specialist

## Request Number and Status

*   Reference Number: PW-23-01020256
*   Solicitation Number: 9F032-21-0225
*   Publication Date: 2023-01-05
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-27T14:00:00
*   Tender Status: Expired

## Invitation to Bid

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is to select a contractor to provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) for the Canadian Space Agency. The requirement is for a C.2 Information Technology Security Methodology, Policy and Procedures Analyst Security VA Specialist.

## Required Services

The successful contractor will be required to provide the following services:

*   Conduct risk- and threat-based assessments for new technology solutions
*   Develop a simplified process for internal use to perform risk and threat assessments
*   Be up-to-date with Government of Canada (GC) best practices in the field of cloud computing

## Eligibility Requirements

Only suppliers who are Invitation to Bid Holders under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement # EN578-170432/B are eligible to participate in this process. The list of eligible suppliers is attached to this RFP.

## Contracting Information

*   Contracting Authority: Julie Mercier
*   Phone Number: 438-270-5868
*   E-Mail: julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca

## Important Notes

*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language.
*   SPICT is the mandatory method of supply to address a specific Information Technology (IT) professional services, task solutions based, at or above the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) threshold.

You can submit your questions and proposal to Julie Mercier, Contracting Authority, at julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca. Good luck with your contract!
